description: TBS Collective Agreements - metadata for federal public service unionized employee bargaining agreements

agreement_id.description: Unique identifier for the collective agreement (UUID)

agreement_name.description: Full name of the collective agreement (e.g., 'Economics and Social Science Services (EC)')

og_code.description: Primary occupational group code covered by this agreement

og_subgroup_codes.description: JSON array of all subgroup codes covered by this agreement

bargaining_agent.description: Union or bargaining agent representing employees (e.g., 'Public Service Alliance of Canada')

employer.description: Employer signatory (typically 'Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat')

signing_date.description: Date the collective agreement was signed (YYYY-MM-DD)

expiry_date.description: Date the agreement expires (YYYY-MM-DD), null if evergreen

notes: Contains metadata for represented/unionized federal public service collective agreements
Each agreement covers one or more occupational groups/subgroups
Expiry dates indicate when agreement needs to be renegotiated
Bargaining agents represent employees in collective bargaining
